__e: Silly me, I read the statute and I actually believe it means what it says.
I know this is very silly, and I'm sure you don't remember, not with all the millions of people you meet...
I suppose it's foolish of me to think it could ever be the same.
But going against them on your own, that's some foolish bullshit, no matter who you are.
No, of course he's not, but since the other side made that argument, it would be foolish not to use it to our advantage.
So what? So you thought like God, and that was a silly, right?

Well, I think it's a darn silly idea, but it's your business.
